mapper.select: /* 상담시간 미생성 참가업체 조회 */ select eec.ev_expo_id , eec.cust_id , ee.expo_consult_from_dt , ee.expo_consult_to_dt , '214019' as consult_fr_time , '214036' as consult_to_time from ev_expo_customer eec , ev_expo ee where eec.ev_expo_id = ee.ev_expo_id and not exists (select 1 from ev_consult_time where ev_expo_id = eec.ev_expo_id and cust_id = eec.cust_id) and eec.ev_expo_id = #{ev_expo_id}
